snippet: At least four people were killed and eight injured in what appeared to be a knife fight in the city of Korla, in the western Chinese region of Xinjiang, regional officials said Friday.
lead_paragraph: At least four people were killed and eight injured in what appeared to be a knife fight in the city of Korla, in the western Chinese region of Xinjiang, regional officials said Friday.

headline.main: China: Killings in Xinjiang Stir Fears of Heightened Ethnic Tensions
headline.print_headline: China: Killings in Xinjiang Stir Fears Of Heightened Ethnic Tensions
